scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd admin && npm run dev" "node index.js"
scripts.preinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install && cd ../lib && npm install
scripts.uninstall: npx rimraf backend/node_modules backend/package-lock.json admin/node_modules admin/package-lock.json lib/node_modules lib/package-lock.json node_modules package-lock.json
